title: [EPIC] Phase 5: Enterprise Features & Compliance
description:
**MOVED UP FROM PHASE 6. UPDATED DEPENDENCIES.** Features for enterprise customers: HRIS integration, analytics, accessibility, GDPR/CCPA compliance.

**Timeline:** 8-10 weeks
**Team:** Core MVP team (Team A)
**Priority:** MEDIUM (P2)
**Dependencies:** Phase 3 (Appeals)

**Key Deliverables:**

**5.1 HRIS Integration:**
- Native connectors: Workday, SAP SuccessFactors, BambooHR
- Bi-directional sync:
  - Import: Employee data, org structure, job titles
  - Export: Exam results, completion status, certificates
- Configuration UI for API credentials and field mapping
- Scheduled sync (daily/hourly) + webhook support

**5.2 Metrics & Analytics:**
- **Executive Dashboard:** Completion rates, success rates, appeal metrics, cost per exam
- **Operations Dashboard:** Active sessions, review queue length, avg review time
- **Integrity Dashboard:** Flag analytics, overturn rates, bias monitoring
- **Automated Alerting:** Email/Slack notifications for threshold breaches

**5.3 Accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA):**
- Complete keyboard navigation (no mouse required)
- Screen reader optimization (ARIA labels, semantic HTML)
- High contrast mode
- Font scaling to 200% without loss of functionality
- Accommodation management:
  - Extended time (1.5x, 2x)
  - Additional breaks
  - Screen reader permission during exam

**5.4 Compliance & Privacy:**
- **GDPR/CCPA Consent Management:**
  - Granular consent for biometrics, video recording, data sharing
  - Consent withdrawal workflow
- **Data Subject Rights Portal:**
  - View all stored data
  - Download data (JSON export)
  - Request deletion (with retention policy checks)
- **Data Retention Policies:**
  - Configurable retention periods (30/60/90/180 days, 1/2/7 years)
  - Automated deletion of expired data
  - Legal hold support
- **Biometric Data Policies (BIPA compliance):**
  - Illinois, Texas, Washington state requirements
  - Purpose disclosure, retention limits

**Database Changes:**
```prisma
model HRISIntegration {
  id                     String              @id @default(cuid())
  organizationId         String
  provider               String              // workday, sap, bamboohr
  credentials            String              @db.Text // Encrypted
  fieldMapping           Json
  syncSchedule           String              // cron expression
  lastSyncAt             DateTime?
  lastSyncStatus         String?
}

model Accommodation {
  id                     String              @id @default(cuid())
  candidateId            String
  examId                 String
  type                   String              // extended_time, breaks, screen_reader
  value                  Json                // Type-specific config
  approvedBy             String
  expiresAt              DateTime?
}

model Consent {
  id                     String              @id @default(cuid())
  userId                 String
  consentType            String              // biometrics, video_recording, data_sharing
  granted                Boolean
  grantedAt              DateTime
  withdrawnAt            DateTime?
}

model DataRetentionPolicy {
  id                     String              @id @default(cuid())
  organizationId         String
  dataType               String              // exam_sessions, recordings, biometrics
  retentionDays          Int
  autoDelete             Boolean             @default(true)
}
```

**New Packages:**
- @proctorguard/hris (HRIS provider abstraction)
- @proctorguard/analytics (metrics aggregation)
- @proctorguard/compliance (GDPR/CCPA helpers)

**Success Metrics:**
- HRIS sync success rate >99%
- WCAG 2.1 AA audit pass 100% (third-party audit)
- Data subject request response time <5 business days
- Zero data retention policy violations

**Risks & Mitigation:**
- **Risk:** HRIS API changes breaking sync
  - **Mitigation:** Version all integrations, maintain test environments
- **Risk:** Accessibility regression
  - **Mitigation:** Automated a11y testing in CI/CD
- **Risk:** Compliance audit failure
  - **Mitigation:** Legal review before launch, annual audits
